svg.text: GitHub Actions Pipeline Chat Interface - Complete Request Flow
AI DevOps Platform | Sequence Diagram | 14 Participants | 103 Steps | 10 Phases
FastAPI + Ollama/Claude + Gitea + ChromaDB + Nexus + Reinforcement Learning + Self-Healing
DECISION: Template found? -> skip to validation
PHASE 3: LLM GENERATION (if no ChromaDB template)
parse YAML, ensure env vars, self-hosted runners, on:true fix
parse + strip code fences -> updated files
LOOP back to step 28 until valid or max...
If missing: skopeo copy docker.io -> ai-nexus:5001
build response: source banner + lang/fw + validation + preview
Frontend displays workflow preview to user
job list with status/conclusion per job
poll -> completed=true -> stop polling -> show success
update progress: 'Fetching error logs for self-heal...'
POST /api/generate {fix prompt + error log + error type}
GET /contents/ci.yml -> 200 -> PUT with SHA to update
GET /contents/Dockerfile -> 200 -> PUT with SHA to update
files updated -> triggers new workflow run
LOOP back to step 67 (monitor new workflow run)
If succeeds -> go to step 73 (success path)
If fails again & attempts < max -> step 82 (self-heal)
If max attempts reached -> 'Failed after 10 attempts'
poll -> completed=true -> stop -> show final result
Phases: 1-6 Generate & Commit (green) | 7-9 Monitor (green/async) | 10A Success (green) | 10B Self-Heal (orange)
14 Participants | 103 Steps | 11 Phases | 10 Max Self-Heal Attempts | Poll Interval: 30s (monitor) / 10s (frontend) | Log Truncation: 8000 chars
